snippet.title: Let's Play The Riven Demo with Cyan's Harrison Pink and Claire Hummel
snippet.description:
We debuted this video during Steam Next Fest last week but wanted to bring it to a wider audience! It's not too late to play the Demo version of Riven. See below for the link...

Join Cyan's Lead Visual Designer, Claire Hummel (@shoomlah), and Lead Gameplay Designer Harrison Pink (@GilesPink) as they play through our recently released DEMO VERSION of our upcoming from-the-ground-up remake of Riven.

Claire and Harrison are in a unique position to share new details and surprising revelations in this “Let’s Play”: their collective 30+ years making video games have been deeply influenced as lifelong fans of the original Riven (1997). Their familiarity with Riven’s lore combined with their career knowledge of video game development will make this a fun and interesting ride!

-----
